quest.title: Chapter 1: Awakening
quest.description: Gather your equipment and strength. venture out
step: Head over to the meeting room.
Pick up the gun and remove the boulders blocking the path.
Find a way to get across the damaged floor.

quest.title: Chapter 2: The city that never was
quest.description: Once a proud city state that punches above the weight. Now a husk of its former self.
step: Find a way pass the cars
Clear away the benches somehow, to cross over.
Find way to get into the submarine.

quest.title: Chapter 3: RSS Invicible
quest.description: Once a vessel of the proud RSN.
